					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Successful move[:fr]RÃ©ussir son dÃ©mÃ©nagement[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/reussir-son-demenagement/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Nov 2023 16:43:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=19</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We are already in the middle of moving season. Although most moves take place on July 1, the season officially starts on April 1.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This month, we have written for you some tips to make your move a success. This will help you plan your actions and avoid several unpleasant surprises.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Rent a truck</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Indeed, it can be difficult to make your move with a car. Even if the space of some vehicles allows you to enter a lot of things, it is still quite rare that your mattress or your appliances can fit in. You will therefore need to rent a truck and we advise you to book one as soon as possible. If, unfortunately, you try to rent a truck a few days or weeks before your move, it may be that the rental is excessively expensive, that the truck is not suitable for your needs (too small or too big for what you have to carry) or you may not even find one.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Pack your belongings</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A priori, you will find cardboard boxes from several suppliers. However, the price is quite high. We therefore advise you to contact local merchants who receive merchandise regularly. For example, grocery stores or pharmacies. They may have received their orders recently and will be happy to offer you the boxes rather than putting them for recycling. To pack your dishes or fragile items, it is recommended to use newspaper or old promotional flyers. Again, you can go to the merchants in your neighborhood who may be able to provide you with old copies of their flyers. If you are currently staying in a building with several apartments, it is possible that at the entrance there is a display in which you will find several flyers. Paper will protect your objects and not damage them. Don't forget to recycle it afterwards!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Address changes</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>How many utilities need to know your address? Much more than you think!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Making your address changes can be long and tedious. Fortunately, the governments of Canada and Quebec have made available an online form that allows you to apply the change of address to all services offered by these two levels of government. For example, by filling out the form on the&nbsp; QuÃ©bec <a href="https://www.adresse.gouv.qc.ca/inscrire/FormulaireChangementAdresse.aspx?Etape=0">government's website</a>, you can change your address with Revenu QuÃ©bec, the SAAQ, the RAMQ, etc. Subsequently, you will only have to make the change with your insurer, financial institution, telephone provider and any other service you receive.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Items to keep close to you</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>On the day of your move, when everything is packed and you have taken possession of your new home, some things will be useful from the first hours. First, keep toilet paper, tissues and/or napkins handy. This will come in handy in many situations. Then have a bottle of water, because the further we go through the moving season, the higher the temperatures are likely to be and you will need to hydrate. Do not store all your kitchen utensils in the boxes. After the move, you and your loved ones will be hungry. This is not the best time to go in search of kitchen items. Finally, identify the place where your curtains are. The first night in a new home is rarely comfortable, but you can still create a little bubble of privacy.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Are you currently looking for accommodation? Not sure where to start in your research? Do not hesitate to make an appointment with one of&nbsp; our <a href="https://calendly.com/promis-immigration-fr/accueil-et-integration/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=google&_ga=2.214035026.418179170.1685453370-558328577.1680200292&_gl=1%2A1smp9ea%2A_ga%2ANTU4MzI4NTc3LjE2ODAyMDAyOTI.%2A_ga_P0D3ELB177%2AMTY4NTYzMjUxMy4zMS4xLjE2ODU2MzMyMTguNTAuMC4w&month=2023-06/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=live">reception and integration counsellors</a> or with our <a href="https://calendly.com/promis-immigration-fr/soutien-aux-familles/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=google&_gl=1%2A1x5vd74%2A_ga%2ANTU4MzI4NTc3LjE2ODAyMDAyOTI.%2A_ga_P0D3ELB177%2AMTY4NTYzMjUxMy4zMS4xLjE2ODU2MzMyNDIuMjYuMC4w&_ga=2.214035026.418179170.1685453370-558328577.1680200292&month=2023-06/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=live">family support service counsellor</a>. We're here to help!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400">Nous sommes dÃ©jÃ  en plein cÅur de la saison du dÃ©mÃ©nagement. MÃªme si la plupart des dÃ©mÃ©nagements sâeffectuent le 1er juillet, la saison dÃ©marre officiellement le 1er avril.<br><br>Ce mois-ci, nous avons rÃ©digÃ© pour vous quelques conseils afin de bien rÃ©ussir votre dÃ©mÃ©nagement. Cela vous aidera Ã  planifier vos actions et Ã  Ã©viter plusieurs mauvaises surprises.<br><br>Louer un camion En effet, il peut Ãªtre difficile dâeffectuer votre dÃ©mÃ©nagement avec une voiture. MÃªme si lâespace de certains vÃ©hicules permet dây entrer beaucoup de choses, il est tout de mÃªme assez rare que votre matelas ou encore vos Ã©lectromÃ©nagers puissent sây insÃ©rer. Vous aurez donc besoin de louer un camion et nous vous conseillons dâen rÃ©server un le plus rapidement possible. Si, malheureusement, vous tentez de louer un camion quelques jours ou semaines avant votre dÃ©mÃ©nagement, il se peut que la location vous coÃ»te excessivement cher, que le camion ne soit pas adaptÃ© Ã  vos besoins (trop petit ou trop grand pour ce que vous avez Ã  transporter) ou vous risquez mÃªme de ne pas en trouver.<br><br>Emballer vos effets personnels Ã priori, vous trouverez des boÃ®tes de carton chez plusieurs fournisseurs. Cependant, le prix est assez Ã©levÃ©. Nous vous conseillons donc de vous adresser aux commerÃ§ants du coin qui reÃ§oivent de la marchandise rÃ©guliÃ¨rement. Par exemple, les Ã©piceries ou les pharmacies. Ceux-ci peuvent avoir reÃ§u leurs commandes rÃ©cemment et seront ravis de vous offrir les boÃ®tes plutÃ´t que de les mettre au recyclage. Pour emballer votre vaisselle ou vos objets fragiles, il est recommandÃ© dâutiliser du papier journal ou dâanciens circulaires de promotion. Encore une fois, vous pouvez vous adresser aux commerÃ§ants de votre quartier qui pourront peut-Ãªtre vous fournir les vieux exemplaires de leurs circulaires. Si vous logez actuellement dans un immeuble de plusieurs appartements, il est possible quâÃ  lâentrÃ©e se trouve un prÃ©sentoir dans lequel vous trouverez plusieurs circulaires. Le papier permettra de protÃ©ger vos objets et de ne pas les abÃ®mer. Nâoubliez pas de le recycler par la suite !<br><br>Les changements dâadresse Combien de services publics ont besoin de connaÃ®tre votre adresse ? Beaucoup plus que vous ne le croyez !<br><br>Effectuer ses changements dâadresse peut Ãªtre long et fastidieux. Heureusement, les gouvernements du Canada et du QuÃ©bec mettent Ã  votre disposition, en ligne, un formulaire qui permet dâappliquer le changement dâadresse Ã  tous les services offerts par ces deux paliers gouvernementaux. Par exemple, en remplissant le formulaire qui se trouve sur le site web du gouvernement du QuÃ©bec, vous pouvez changer votre adresse auprÃ¨s de Revenu QuÃ©bec, de la SAAQ, de la RAMQ, etc. Par la suite, vous nâaurez quâÃ  faire la modification auprÃ¨s de votre assureur, institution financiÃ¨re, fournisseur tÃ©lÃ©phonique et tout autre service dont vous bÃ©nÃ©ficiez.<br><br>Les articles Ã  garder prÃ¨s de vous le jour de votre dÃ©mÃ©nagement, lorsque tout sera emballÃ© et que vous aurez pris possession de votre nouveau logement, certaines choses vous seront utiles dÃ¨s les premiÃ¨res heures. Tout dâabord, conservez Ã  porter de main du papier toilette, des mouchoirs et/ou serviettes de table. Cela vous sera utile dans plusieurs situations. Ensuite, ayez une bouteille dâeau, car plus nous avanÃ§ons dans la saison du dÃ©mÃ©nagement, plus les tempÃ©ratures risquent dâÃªtre Ã©levÃ©es et vous aurez besoin de vous hydrater. Ne rangez pas dans les boÃ®tes tous vos ustensiles de cuisine. AprÃ¨s le dÃ©mÃ©nagement, vous et vos proches aurez faim. Ce nâest pas le meilleur moment pour partir Ã  la recherche des articles de cuisine. Pour terminer, identifier bien lâendroit oÃ¹ se trouvent vos rideaux. La premiÃ¨re nuit dans un nouveau logement est rarement confortable, mais vous pourrez tout de mÃªme vous crÃ©er une petite bulle dâintimitÃ©.<br><br>Vous Ãªtes actuellement Ã  la recherche dâun logement ? Vous ne savez pas par oÃ¹ commencer dans vos recherches ? NâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  prendre rendez-vous avec lâun de nos conseillers en accueil et intÃ©gration ou avec notre conseillÃ¨re du service de soutien aux familles. Nous sommes lÃ  pour vous aider !</h4>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Sarah's contribution[:fr]La contribution de Sarah[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/la-contribution-de-sarah/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:03:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=23</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Maria-Goretti residence, PROMIS' accommodation service, recently inaugurated its cafÃ© space on the 5th floor: the MG cafÃ©.<br><br>It is a place of sharing, warm and very well appointed, in which residents can meet to discuss over a coffee. In order to make the atmosphere more pleasant, a resident wanted to use her artistic talents to offer a fresco. We present the story of this young woman through a text that she wrote herself.<br><br>Sarah<br>'s letter I am Sarah, an energetic girl, passionate about sports and art. I particularly like to paint. I love creating and working manually, it embellishes my life and my daily life.<br><br>Seven years ago, I left my home country of Iran hoping to find more stable conditions and a better quality of life in Canada. When I arrived here, I enrolled in the Preschool and Elementary Education program at UQAM, which is an exciting field in which I wanted to improve. My journey as a student here has certainly been one of many challenges and difficulties to face. I went through difficult times, but my determination and dreams led me to continue this adventure. Moreover, an important motivation was to have my own class and to accompany students. Now, I am proud to have the opportunity to be a teacher in a reception class in Montreal and to accompany young people who have a similar background to mine.<br><br>What happiness when a dream comes true!<br><br>Immigration has brought me a lot. In other words, it allowed me to grow. I saw in me a courageous and persevering girl who continued to move forward despite fears and doubts. I learned to believe in myself.<br>Living in a residence has allowed me to take advantage of the opportunities offered by a community life: sharing, complicity, discoveries, meetings, harmony, respect, serenity, freedom, security, warm welcome, positive energy and tranquility.<br><br>My time at the Maria-Goretti residence offered me a living environment that acted as a safe nest where I was able to equip myself and drop myself off during my first years in Canada. This passage gives us a wonderful energy and impetus for the rest of our lives in this country and for our complete fulfillment.<br>Thank you very much to the management team who takes us under their wing, who ensures our daily well-being, our comfort and the quality of the services offered. For us, who leave our nest to settle here, words fail to signify the importance that this represents and all our gratitude for it.<br>Before I left this exceptional residence, I wanted to leave a little sweetness for all of you, namely the paintings I made in the new cafÃ© on the 5th floor.<br><br>This is my way of saying THANK YOU!<br><br>Sarah Khademagha</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":5} -->
<h5 class="wp-block-heading">&nbsp;</h5>
<!-- /wp:heading -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->

Jâaime particuliÃ¨rement peindre. Ce passage nous donne une Ã©nergie et un Ã©lan merveilleux pour la suite de notre vie dans ce pays et pour sây accomplir complÃ¨tement.<br>Merci infiniment Ã  lâÃ©quipe de gestion qui nous prend sous son aile, qui sâassure de notre bien-Ãªtre au quotidien, de notre confort et de la qualitÃ© des services offerts. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]The power of networking[:fr]La puissance du rÃ©seautage[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/la-puissance-du-reseautage/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:10:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=24</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We regularly hear about the importance of surrounding yourself with a network of acquaintances. This is an even more necessary factor for a person in an immigration situation. Whether you arrived in Quebec alone or with your family, building a circle of personal and professional acquaintances will be of great help. We tend to underestimate the impact that some people can have in our lives. Meeting new people can give access to a whole new world.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Here are some tips.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><a><strong>Job search</strong></a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Having a professional network makes it much easier to find a job. Indeed, job offers are mostly accessible through job search web platforms as well as through companies' communication channels. However, there is a lot of word of mouth. That is to say, you have to be in contact with the right people to be able to benefit from opportunities that will not be offered to the general public and that will be accessible to you thanks to the people in your network. In addition to making your job search easier, professional networking can be beneficial for entrepreneurs.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><a><strong>Potential customers</strong></a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Having a business means facing issues such as acquiring new customers and retaining and retaining current customers. Networking is interesting because it can allow you to get in touch with potential customers. By expanding your community, you will be able to reach a much larger pool of people who will learn about your business. These people may be interested in your products or services. This new clientele will be able to share their appreciation of your company in their own network and become ambassadors for your brand.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><a><strong>Social life</strong></a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Recent immigration greatly affects the social life of people who experience this situation. This is why it is strongly recommended to create a circle of acquaintances when arriving on the host land. It can be comforting to meet people who are going through similar situations, whether they come from the same country of origin or not. It can also be reassuring to get to know people from the country in which we settle. Thus, you can register, for example, for a sports class or a creative workshop. In addition, volunteer opportunities can support your social gatherings and promote your integration.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These networking options can be done in different ways. In particular, by using social networks, integrating into a group or frequenting particular places. Here are some opportunities not to be missed to grow your network:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In connection with its employment assistance service, PROMIS presents a workshop on the use of the professional social network LinkedIn. Consult&nbsp; the <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/calendrier/">calendar of activities</a> for the date of the next session.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PROMIS has set up an immigrant entrepreneurship project. Several times a year, series of workshops are offered to help you plan a business project.<br>Do you want to perfect your knowledge and start a business? Check&nbsp; the <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/formation-gratuite-en-entrepreneuriat-pour-immigrants/">website</a> for details on the next cohort.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PROMIS Family Support and School Support offers you the opportunity to get involved in the community. Interested in volunteering? Do not hesitate to contact us: <a href="mailto:info@promis.qc.ca">info@promis.qc.ca</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Nous entendons rÃ©guliÃ¨rement parler de lâimportance de sâentourer dâun rÃ©seau de connaissances. Câest un facteur dâautant plus nÃ©cessaire pour une personne en situation dâimmigration. Que vous soyez arrivÃ© au QuÃ©bec seul ou accompagnÃ© de votre famille, la construction dâun cercle de connaissances personnelles et professionnelles vous sera dâune grande aide. Nous avons tendance Ã  sous-estimer lâimpact que certaines personnes peuvent avoir dans notre vie. Rencontrer de nouvelles personnes peut donner accÃ¨s Ã  un tout Nouveau Monde.<br><br>Voici quelques astuces.<br><br>La recherche dâemploi<br>Avoir un rÃ©seau professionnel facilite Ã©normÃ©ment la recherche dâemploi. Or, il existe beaucoup de bouche Ã  oreille. Câest-Ã -dire quâil faut Ãªtre en contact avec les bonnes personnes pour pouvoir bÃ©nÃ©ficier des opportunitÃ©s qui ne seront pas offertes au grand public et qui vous seront accessibles grÃ¢ce aux personnes de votre rÃ©seau. Le rÃ©seautage est intÃ©ressant, car il peut vous permettre dâentrer en contact avec des clients potentiels. Cette nouvelle clientÃ¨le pourra partager son apprÃ©ciation de votre entreprise dans son propre rÃ©seau et devenir ambassadeur de votre marque.<br><br>La vie sociale<br>Lâimmigration rÃ©cente affecte Ã©normÃ©ment la vie sociale des personnes qui vivent cette situation. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]When a career reorganization is needed[:fr]Quand une rÃ©orientation de carriÃ¨re sâimpose[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/quand-une-reorientation-de-carriere-simpose/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:12:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=25</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Moving to a new country does not mean that it will be possible to keep a job in the same field as in one's home country. In Quebec, some sectors of activity are more in demand than others. In addition, it is sometimes necessary to obtain equivalencies in terms of studies to practice one's profession in another country. The procedures, the training and the costs involved are sometimes not what we aspire to when we arrive in a new region. This is why many immigrants opt for career reorientation. We present you some tips to enlighten your choice.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><a><strong>Identify your needs</strong></a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To start, it is very important to know your own needs and desires. Certainly, when you arrive in the country, it is often urgent to find work. However, it can be beneficial to take a job and start the career transition process at the same time. To target your interests and help you in your choice, do not hesitate to use tools such as online orientation questionnaires or consult a counsellor in order to carry out an orientation test. This is a good time to ask yourself about your future and what you would like to do with it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><a><strong>Learn about opportunities</strong></a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As mentioned earlier, the areas seeking the highest number of employees differ by geographic region. Thus, it is essential to learn about opportunities and analyze the job market according to where you decide to settle. Many websites are at your disposal to identify the sectors of activity offering the most opportunities in Quebec.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><a><strong>Have the required training</strong></a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Although an industry is attractive to you and offers many opportunities, you may not have the training required to get a job in that field. Therefore, it is necessary to inquire with an employment assistance counsellor in order to identify the prerequisites and start the right training. Some institutions offer low-cost courses on an evening schedule, allowing you to have a job during the day while learning the basics of another trade.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><a><strong>Use all the resources at your disposal</strong></a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Whether it's doing your own online research or making an appointment with an expert, we recommend that you use all the resources that can be made available to you in your job search. In addition, depending on the type of training and your immigration status, you may be eligible for a loan and bursary program that will help finance your return to school. PROMIS offers two services to facilitate your integration into the job market. Employment Assistance counsellors can help you through all of the steps listed above and help you get into a field you're passionate about. Otherwise, if you wish to settle in the region, that is to say outside Montreal and its peripheries, our regional settlement advisors are able to support you in your approach and help you in your projects.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For more information or to get an appointment with an employment assistance counsellor or a settlement counsellor in the regions, visit the page of the service of your choice:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/aide-a-lemploi/">Employment assistance</a></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/emploi-en-region/">Settling in the regions</a></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sâinstaller dans un nouveau pays ne veut pas dire quâil sera possible de conserver un emploi dans le mÃªme domaine que dans son pays dâorigine. Au QuÃ©bec, certains secteurs dâactivitÃ©s sont plus en demande que dâautres. De plus, il est parfois nÃ©cessaire dâobtenir des Ã©quivalences en termes dâÃ©tudes pour pratiquer son mÃ©tier dans un autre pays. Les procÃ©dures, la formation et les coÃ»ts que cela implique ne sont parfois pas ce Ã  quoi nous aspirons en arrivant dans une nouvelle rÃ©gion. Câest pourquoi plusieurs personnes immigrantes optent pour la rÃ©orientation de carriÃ¨re. Nous vous prÃ©sentons quelques astuces afin dâÃ©clairer votre choix.<br><br>Identifier ses besoins<br>Pour dÃ©buter, il est trÃ¨s important de connaÃ®tre vos propres besoins et vos envies. Il est certain quâen arrivant au pays, il est souvent urgent de trouver du travail. Toutefois, il peut Ãªtre bÃ©nÃ©fique de prendre un emploi et dâentamer en mÃªme temps le processus de rÃ©orientation de carriÃ¨re. Pour cibler vos intÃ©rÃªts et vous aider dans votre choix, nâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  utiliser des outils tels que des questionnaires dâorientation en ligne ou Ã  consulter un orienteur dans le but de rÃ©aliser un test dâorientation. Câest une bonne pÃ©riode pour vous questionner sur votre avenir et ce que vous aimeriez en faire.<br>Prendre connaissance des opportunitÃ©s.<br><br>Comme nous le mentionnions prÃ©cÃ©demment, les domaines recherchant le plus grand nombre dâemployÃ©s diffÃ¨rent selon la rÃ©gion gÃ©ographique. Ainsi, il est primordial de prendre connaissance des opportunitÃ©s et dâanalyser le marchÃ© de lâemploi selon lâendroit dans lequel vous dÃ©cidez de vous installer. De nombreux sites web sont Ã  votre disposition pour identifier les secteurs dâactivitÃ©s offrant le plus de possibilitÃ©s au QuÃ©bec.<br><br>Avoir la formation requise<br>Bien quâun secteur dâactivitÃ©s soit attrayant pour vous et offre de nombreuses opportunitÃ©s, il se peut que vous ne possÃ©diez pas la formation requise pour obtenir un emploi dans ce domaine. Par consÃ©quent, il est nÃ©cessaire de se renseigner auprÃ¨s dâun conseiller en aide Ã  lâemploi afin dâidentifier les prÃ©requis et dâentamer la bonne formation. Certaines institutions offrent des cours Ã  faible prix selon un horaire de soir, ce qui vous permet dâavoir un emploi le jour tout en apprenant les bases dâun autre mÃ©tier.<br><br>Utiliser toutes les ressources Ã  votre disposition<br>Que ce soit en effectuant vous-mÃªme des recherches en ligne ou en prenant rendez-vous avec un expert, nous vous recommandons dâutiliser toutes les ressources qui peuvent Ãªtre mises Ã  votre disposition dans votre recherche dâemploi. En outre, selon le type de formation et votre statut dâimmigration, vous pourriez Ãªtre Ã©ligible Ã  un programme de prÃªt et bourse qui vous aidera Ã  financer votre retour aux Ã©tudes. PROMIS vous propose deux services pour faciliter votre intÃ©gration sur le marchÃ© du travail. Les conseillers du service dâaide Ã  lâemploi peuvent vous aider Ã  travers toutes les Ã©tapes nommÃ©es prÃ©cÃ©demment et favoriser vos chances dâintÃ©grer un domaine qui vous passionne. Autrement, si vous souhaitez vous installer en rÃ©gion, câest-Ã -dire Ã  lâextÃ©rieur de MontrÃ©al et de ses pÃ©riphÃ©ries, nos conseillers Ã  lâÃ©tablissement en rÃ©gion sont en mesure de vous Ã©pauler dans votre dÃ©marche et vous aider dans vos projets.<br>Pour avoir plus de renseignements ou pour obtenir un rendez-vous avec un conseiller en aide Ã  lâemploi ou avec un conseiller Ã  lâÃ©tablissement en rÃ©gion, consultez la page du service de votre choix :<br><br>Aide Ã  lâemploi<br>SâÃ©tablir en rÃ©gion</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Testimonial of a successful career[:fr]TÃ©moignage dâun parcours rÃ©ussi[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/temoignage-dun-parcours-reussi/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:13:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=26</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This month, we wanted to share with you the testimony of someone who has benefited from PROMIS' family support service. His life journey, his experience with the organization as well as his investment in his projects and his family demonstrate incredible strength and resilience. PROMIS is very proud to have been able to accomplish its mission by accompanying this person through his immigration journey.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This person arrived from Cameroon several years ago. She has not had an easy journey. After fighting and litigating her case in court for emancipation as an individual and parent of two children, she faced many challenges as an immigrant.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PROMIS services were introduced to her at her children's school by a school liaison officer. This is how she was informed of the offer of the family support service and a first meeting was organized with Ginette Bibeau, social integration counsellor.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After training as a beneficiary attendant, it was now the entrepreneurship program for immigrants at PROMIS that caught his attention. The success of this program led him to start his own housekeeping business. Her goal was to be able to manage her schedule, acquire a greater level of freedom and be more available to her children.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With Ginette, a strong relationship has been created. It is a comfort, a motivation and an invaluable development of his immigration journey that have been offered to him. In addition to helping him receive the monetary benefits that were available in his situation, Ginette led him to discover the benefits of a good integration thanks to the group outings organized by PROMIS.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After many years of waiting and many pitfalls on his journey, this person finally obtained his permanent residence. Several periods of discouragement failed to make him let go. A meeting with an employment counsellor allowed him to write his resume. The stars are now aligned. An institution wishes to offer him a position that will allow him to pursue his personal development.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>During the interview, several points emerged, but what struck me the most was the strength of character, determination and patience of this person who had everything to gain in the success of his journey.<br>Moreover, she wanted to pass on advice to recent immigrants who find themselves in vulnerable situations: "Do not miss any chance, seize every opportunity to integrate well, that's the key!"</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ce mois-ci, nous voulions vous partager le tÃ©moignage dâune personne qui a bÃ©nÃ©ficiÃ© du service de soutien aux familles de PROMIS. Son parcours de vie, son expÃ©rience auprÃ¨s de lâorganisme ainsi que son investissement dans ses projets et auprÃ¨s de sa famille dÃ©montrent une force et une rÃ©silience incroyables. PROMIS est trÃ¨s fier dâavoir pu accomplir sa mission en accompagnant cette personne Ã  travers son parcours dâimmigration.<br><br>Cette personne est arrivÃ©e du Cameroun il y a dÃ©jÃ  plusieurs annÃ©es. Elle nâa pas connu un parcours facile. AprÃ¨s avoir luttÃ© et plaidÃ© sa cause auprÃ¨s des tribunaux pour obtenir son Ã©mancipation en tant quâindividu et parent de deux enfants, elle a dÃ» relever de nombreux dÃ©fis Ã  titre de personne immigrante.<br><br>Les services de PROMIS lui ont Ã©tÃ© prÃ©sentÃ©s Ã  lâÃ©cole de ses enfants par une agente de liaison en milieu scolaire. Câest ainsi quâa Ã©tÃ© portÃ© Ã  sa connaissance lâoffre du service de soutien aux familles et quâune premiÃ¨re rencontre fut organisÃ©e avec Ginette Bibeau, conseillÃ¨re en intÃ©gration sociale.<br><br>AprÃ¨s avoir suivi une formation de prÃ©posÃ© aux bÃ©nÃ©ficiaires, câÃ©tait Ã  prÃ©sent le programme dâentrepreneuriat pour les personnes immigrantes Ã  PROMIS qui attirait son attention. Câest ainsi que la rÃ©ussite de ce programme lâamena Ã  crÃ©er sa propre entreprise de services mÃ©nagers. Son but Ã©tait alors de pouvoir gÃ©rer son horaire, acquÃ©rir un plus important niveau de libertÃ© et Ãªtre plus disponible pour ses enfants.<br><br>Avec Ginette, câest une forte relation qui sâest crÃ©Ã©e. Câest un rÃ©confort, une motivation et un dÃ©veloppement inestimable de son parcours dâimmigration qui lui ont Ã©tÃ© offerts. En plus de lâavoir aidÃ© Ã  recevoir les prestations monÃ©taires qui Ã©taient disponibles dans sa situation, Ginette lâamena Ã  dÃ©couvrir les avantages dâune bonne intÃ©gration notamment grÃ¢ce aux sorties de groupe organisÃ©es par PROMIS.<br><br>AprÃ¨s de nombreuses annÃ©es dâattente et beaucoup dâembÃ»ches sur son parcours, cette personne a enfin obtenu sa rÃ©sidence permanente. Plusieurs pÃ©riodes de dÃ©couragement nâont pas rÃ©ussi Ã  lui faire lÃ¢cher prise. Une rencontre avec une conseillÃ¨re en emploi lui a permis de rÃ©diger son CV. Les Ã©toiles sont maintenant alignÃ©es. Une institution dÃ©sire lui offrir un poste qui lui permettra de poursuivre son Ã©panouissement personnel.<br><br>Durant lâentretien, plusieurs points sont ressortis, mais ce qui mâa interpellÃ© le plus, câest la force de caractÃ¨re, la dÃ©termination et la patience de cette personne qui avait tout Ã  gagner dans la rÃ©ussite de son parcours. Dâailleurs, elle souhaitait transmettre un conseil aux personnes dâimmigration rÃ©cente qui se trouvent dans des situations vulnÃ©rables : Â« Ne laissez passer aucune chance, saisissez toutes les opportunitÃ©s pour bien vous intÃ©grer, câest la clÃ© ! Â».</p>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Withstanding the Quebec winter[:fr]RÃ©sister Ã  lâhiver quÃ©bÃ©cois[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/resister-a-lhiver-quebecois/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:15:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=27</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In Quebec, winter offers us radiant landscapes. On the other hand, it is a tough season. The first winters can be a real challenge. But don't worry! You'll eventually get used to the snow and cold temperatures. According to statistics, the coldest and snowiest months are January and February. However, beware! In Quebec, weather conditions are unstable and we can sometimes have big surprises. To survive the Quebec winter, it is necessary to have the right equipment to stay warm and to know some tips that will facilitate your daily life. Above all, you have to know how to take advantage of this magnificent season to appreciate it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Be warm, but mostly dry</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>First, you will need a toque, a scarf and mittens. Indeed, mittens will retain the heat of your hands better than gloves. Be aware that it is possible to buy these items in many shops, but also in thrift stores and from certain organizations. You will also need a pair of winter boots. Ideally, choose an insulating and waterproof model. The same goes for your winter coat. It is imperative to stay dry to be warm. The use of the "onion" technique is highly recommended. It is composed of 3 layers of clothing. The first is sports underwear, a lightweight base layer. The second is a fleece-style insulation. Then you put on your insulating and waterproof coat. At the beginning and end of the season, you will find several items on sale in the shops. Feel free to buy what you'll need when winter returns and save on regular prices. If you have trouble tolerating the cold, you can get heated pouches to slip into your gloves and/or boots.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some tips</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Plan ahead! When there is a lot of snow, use public transport rather than the car. Road trips are frequent in winter. Buses may be delayed due to inclement weather, but it is still a safe and efficient means of transportation. On the other hand, if you need to use your car, plan to leave early. Snow and poor road conditions slow down traffic a lot. If you do not feel comfortable with winter driving, it is possible to take a specific course. Always be alert to snow removal operations and especially remain very careful when walking in the streets.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When it's very cold, we all tend to turn up the heat in our homes. The disadvantage is that when we go outside, our body experiences a thermal shock due to the large temperature difference. It is best to avoid this situation by keeping the heating of your home around 19 Â°. Finally, a good diet is required. Some foods will provide you with the necessary vitamins and minerals such as fruits and vegetables rich in vitamin B and C.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Enjoying winter</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>During this superb season, you can experience several sports such as ice skating, skiing, snowboarding, hiking and snowshoeing. It is not necessary to have your own equipment to practice these sports. Several places will offer you the possibility to rent the necessary equipment for the day. In Montreal, the trail in Mount Royal Park is a must. In the region, several mountains are accessible. In addition to outdoor activities, there are a multitude of activities to do during the winter. For example, visiting museums, borrowing books from the library, cooking hot meals or playing board games with your family. The human warmth that comes from having a good time surrounded by your loved ones will help you get through the winter.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>PROMIS <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/soutien-aux-familles/">Family Support</a> Service&nbsp; is available if you want help or get involved in the community. Being able to gather and socialize with other families is a good way to expand your circle and enjoy winter activities. We also offer the "Cloakroom" service which allows people in need to buy some winter items.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Au QuÃ©bec, lâhiver nous offre des paysages radieux. En revanche, câest une saison rude. Les premiers hivers peuvent Ãªtre un vÃ©ritable dÃ©fi Ã  relever. Mais ne vous inquiÃ©tez pas! Vous finirez par vous habituer Ã  la neige et aux tempÃ©ratures froides. Selon les statistiques, les mois les plus froids et enneigÃ©s sont janvier et fÃ©vrier. Toutefois, mÃ©fiez-vous! Au QuÃ©bec, les conditions mÃ©tÃ©orologiques sont instables et nous pouvons parfois avoir de grandes surprises. Pour survivre Ã  lâhiver quÃ©bÃ©cois, il est nÃ©cessaire dâavoir le bon Ã©quipement pour rester au chaud et de connaÃ®tre quelques astuces qui faciliteront votre quotidien. Surtout, il faut savoir profiter de cette magnifique saison pour lâapprÃ©cier.<br><br>Ãtre au chaud, mais surtout au sec<br><br>Tout dâabord, il vous faudra une tuque, un foulard et des mitaines. En effet, les mitaines vont mieux conserver la chaleur de vos mains que les gants. Sachez quâil est possible de vous procurer ces articles dans de nombreuses boutiques, mais Ã©galement dans les friperies et auprÃ¨s de certains organismes. Vous aurez Ã©galement besoin dâune paire de bottes dâhiver. IdÃ©alement, choisissez un modÃ¨le isolant et impermÃ©able. De mÃªme pour votre manteau dâhiver. Il est impÃ©ratif de rester au sec pour Ãªtre bien au chaud. Lâutilisation de la technique de Â« lâoignon Â» est fortement recommandÃ©e. Celle-ci est composÃ©e de 3 couches de vÃªtements. La premiÃ¨re est un sous-vÃªtement de sport, une couche de base lÃ©gÃ¨re. La deuxiÃ¨me est un isolant de style polaire. Ensuite, vous enfilez votre manteau isolant et impermÃ©able. En dÃ©but et en fin de saison, vous trouverez plusieurs articles en solde dans les boutiques. NâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  acheter ce dont vous aurez besoin lorsque lâhiver sera de retour et Ã  Ã©conomiser sur les prix courants. Si vous avez de la difficultÃ© Ã  tolÃ©rer le froid, vous pouvez vous procurer des pochettes chauffantes Ã  glisser dans vos gants et/ou dans vos bottes.<br><br>Quelques astuces<br>Soyez prÃ©voyants! Lorsquâil y a beaucoup de neige, privilÃ©giez les transports en commun plutÃ´t que la voiture. Les sorties de route sont frÃ©quentes en hiver. Les autobus peuvent avoir du retard en raison des intempÃ©ries, mais cela reste un moyen de transport sÃ»r et efficace. En revanche, sâil vous faut utiliser votre voiture, prÃ©voyez de partir plus tÃ´t. La neige et les mauvaises conditions routiÃ¨res ralentissent beaucoup le trafic. Si vous ne vous sentez pas confortable avec la conduite hivernale, il est possible de suivre un cours spÃ©cifique. Soyez toujours alerte aux opÃ©rations de dÃ©neigement et surtout restez trÃ¨s prudents lorsque vous circulez Ã  pied dans les rues.<br>Quand il fait trÃ¨s froid, nous avons tous tendance Ã  augmenter le chauffage de notre maison. LâinconvÃ©nient est que lorsque nous allons Ã  lâextÃ©rieur, notre corps subit un choc thermique en raison de la grande diffÃ©rence de tempÃ©rature. Il est prÃ©fÃ©rable dâÃ©viter cette situation en tenant le chauffage de votre logement aux alentours de 19Â°. Pour terminer, une bonne alimentation est requise. Certains aliments vous procureront les vitamines et minÃ©raux nÃ©cessaires tels que les fruits et lÃ©gumes riches en vitamine B et C.<br><br>ApprÃ©cier lâhiver<br>Durant cette superbe saison, vous pourrez expÃ©rimenter plusieurs sports tels que le patin Ã  glace, le ski, la planche Ã  neige, la randonnÃ©e et la raquette. Il nâest pas nÃ©cessaire dâavoir votre propre Ã©quipement pour pratiquer ces sports. Plusieurs endroits vous offriront la possibilitÃ© de louer le matÃ©riel nÃ©cessaire pour la journÃ©e. Ã MontrÃ©al, le sentier qui se trouve dans le Parc du Mont-Royal est un incontournable. En rÃ©gion, plusieurs montagnes sont accessibles. Outre les activitÃ©s de plein air, il y a une multitude dâactivitÃ©s Ã  faire durant lâhiver. Par exemple, visiter les musÃ©es, aller emprunter des livres Ã  la bibliothÃ¨que, cuisiner des repas chauds ou faire des jeux de sociÃ©tÃ© en famille. La chaleur humaine que procurent les bons moments entourÃ©s de vos proches vous aidera Ã  passer lâhiver.<br><br>Le service de soutien aux familles de PROMIS est Ã  votre disposition si vous souhaitez obtenir de lâaide ou si vous dÃ©sirez vous impliquer dans la communautÃ©. Pouvoir se rassembler et socialiser avec dâautres familles est une bonne faÃ§on dâÃ©largir votre cercle et de profiter des activitÃ©s hivernales. Nous offrons Ã©galement le service Â« Vestiaire Â» qui permet aux personnes dans le besoin de se procurer quelques articles dâhiver.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Temporary accommodation for women[:fr]HÃ©bergement temporaire pour les femmes[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/28/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Nov 2023 17:28:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=28</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Since 1953, the RÃ©sidence Maria-Goretti has been offering temporary accommodation to women of all origins for short or long-term stays. Close to a number of amenities and services, the facility comprises 200 rooms dedicated to temporary accommodation, as well as 20 rooms for daily stays.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Staying at the Residence</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Various types of stay are available:<br>Residence: for a minimum of 3 months, at a preferential rate (from $405/month) and reserved for women aged between 18 and 45.<br>Transit: for a minimum of 3 months, offering affordable rooms (from $510/month) and designed for women aged 45 and over.<br>Hotel: short stays of a few days. Due to the changing state of sanitary measures imposed by the Quebec government, we recommend that you check the availability of this stay.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Services available</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These different types of accommodation serve as a springboard for residents to start their university term, kick-start their new life, or simply have an affordable, stable and secure pied-Ã -terre. Well served by public transportation and close to bike paths, the Residence is perfect for discovering the city, learning to find your way around and taking the time to settle in! One of the countless advantages of the Residence is that staying there also means being able to benefit from other PROMIS services, such as employment assistance, francization courses or welcome and integration.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Depending on budget, several room options are available: standard or large rooms, with shared bathrooms.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To ensure residents have everything they need at their fingertips, rooms are equipped and furnished with :</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Single bed</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Work desk</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Storage unit</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Washbasin</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Refrigerator</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1 or 2 cupboards</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Heating/ electricity/ hot water</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Telephone with voice mail</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition, the residence offers access to* :</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Communal kitchen with dining area</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Microwave and toaster</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Bathrooms and showers</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Living room with TV</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Study room with Wifi</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Laundry facilities on each floor (extra charge)</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Elevator</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Exercise room</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To enable residents to have everything within easy reach</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>*Accessibility to certain common areas may be subject to change, depending on sanitary measures implemented by the Quebec government.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Reception is open 24 hours a day. The establishment ensures the security of the premises, offering surveillance at all times.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>"Cleanliness, welcome, tranquility, security and comfort await you in a sober, restful setting. This was my first experience but certainly not my last."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>CÃ©line, Norway, Avis Booking</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The residence, a social springboard</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Living at the residence is also a golden opportunity to meet women from all walks of life!<br>While the residence normally organizes a variety of activities to encourage socializing, such as outings, movie nights, board games and the like, these have been put on hold for the time being, due to the current health situation.<br>In addition, the community lounge is a meeting place for those who wish to get together, have tea, chat or share their good addresses!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>History of the residence</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Towards the end of the 1930s, Montreal was experiencing a major industrial boom. Young women left the countryside to work in the city. Away from their families and loved ones, many became vulnerable to difficult situations and even abuse.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Faced with this social phenomenon, Father Alfred-Laplante opened the first shelter exclusively for women aged 18 to 28 in 1945. They were welcomed without distinction - of religion or origin - in this safe place to settle. Soon, the room's capacity was no longer sufficient to meet the growing demand.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The Holy Cross Fathers founded the Centre Maria-Goretti in 1953, offering 175 rooms.<br>In 2004, PROMIS took up the torch, bringing its various services under the same umbrella.<br>From its beginnings as a center for young French-speaking women, it now welcomes women from over 40 different countries every year!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Depuis 1953, la RÃ©sidence Maria-Goretti offre des services dâhÃ©bergement temporaire pour les femmes de toutes origines pour des sÃ©jours de courte ou de longue durÃ©e. <!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Les services disponibles</p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>En plus, la rÃ©sidence offre lâaccÃ¨s Ã * :</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->

<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>La rÃ©sidence, un tremplin social</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Habiter Ã  la rÃ©sidence, câest Ã©galement une occasion en or de rencontrer des femmes, de tout horizon !<br>Alors quâen temps normal, lâÃ©tablissement organise des activitÃ©s variÃ©es pour favoriser les rencontres, telles que des sorties, des soirÃ©es cinÃ©ma ou de jeux de sociÃ©tÃ© et autres, ces derniÃ¨res sont pour lâinstant arrÃªtÃ©es, en raison de la situation sanitaire actuelle.<br>De plus, Le salon communautaire est un lieu de rendez-vous pour celles qui souhaitent se rÃ©unir, prendre le thÃ©, discuter ou encore partager leurs bonnes adresses !</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Lâhistoire de la rÃ©sidence</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Vers la fin des annÃ©es 30, MontrÃ©al connaÃ®t un gros essor industriel. Les jeunes femmes quittent la campagne pour travailler en ville. Loin de leur famille et de leurs proches, plusieurs deviennent alors vulnÃ©rables Ã  des situations difficiles, voire dâabus.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Devant ce phÃ©nomÃ¨ne social, le PÃ¨re Alfred-Laplante ouvre en 1945 le premier lieu dâhÃ©bergement uniquement rÃ©servÃ© aux femmes Ã¢gÃ©es de 18 Ã  28 ans. <!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Les pÃ¨res de Sainte-Croix fondent alors le Centre Maria-Goretti en 1953, offrant 175 chambres.<br>En 2004, câest PROMIS qui reprend le flambeau, tout en regroupant ses divers services sous la mÃªme Ã©gide.<br>Si au dÃ©part le centre accueillait majoritairement de jeunes francophones, ce sont maintenant des femmes de plus de 40 pays diffÃ©rents qui viennent y sÃ©journer chaque annÃ©e !</p>

		<title><![CDATA[[:en]International Day of Living Together[:fr]JournÃ©e nationale du vivre-ensemble[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/journee-nationale-du-vivre-ensemble/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 18 Nov 2023 21:20:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=35</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As part of the National Day of Living Together, which will take place in Quebec on January 15, PROMIS wishes to highlight the presence of 5 public figures who make Quebec's cultural life a space in which diversity continues to flourish.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Kim Thuy</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The writer is of Vietnamese origin. At the age of 10, she left her native country and arrived in Quebec. His literary works are largely inspired by his personal life. Some of his novels refer to the migratory journey of Vietnamese refugees as well as the exploration of dual identity. Kim Thuy is also a speaker. On many occasions, she mentions her beautiful relationship with her host country. In 2020, on the show "Le Temps du dÃ©bat" on France Culture, she shared her feeling that Quebec has allowed her to "solidify [her] anchorage by offering [her] all the freedom necessary to grow [her] branches to the rhythm of the sun and moon."</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Boucar Diouf</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Of Senegalese origin, Boucar Diouf has explored several careers. Among others, he is a television and radio host, biologist, oceanographer, humorist and writer. He moved to Quebec in 1991, in the Rimouski region. Being disabled, he experienced physical and psychological distress that has greatly dissipated since his arrival in the country. In an interview with Chatelaine magazine in 2015, he said: "As an immigrant, if I love this nation, it is because I was offered a living together in a true secularism. Between the setbacks of communitarianism inspired by the British model and this tight mixed Quebec that we are trying to put in place, I am absolutely certain that it is here that we find the most open project of welcoming and integrating diversity. Â»</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Jemmy Echaquan DubÃ©</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This young actress comes from the Attikamek community of Manawan. At the age of 6, she moved to Joliette and was the target of discriminatory comments and acts. Today, she is a testament to her pride in her roots and culture of origin. Her role in a recent series on the small screen gives her hope of becoming a role model for teenagers belonging to Indigenous communities. She is also a spokesperson for the First Nations Youth Network and works for Wapikoni.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Dany LaferriÃ¨re</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition to being a writer, the man of Haitian origin is also a poet, screenwriter, director and journalist. He arrived in Montreal in 1976 and began his writing activities. His career allows him to be discovered by the French public and this leads him to have a wide presence in several Parisian media. Notably, he was elected to the AcadÃ©mie franÃ§aise in 2013. Despite a difficult start during which he obtained precarious jobs, all his literary work has seduced Quebec readers since his 1985 novel. As soon as he arrived, Dany LaferriÃ¨re enjoyed his freedom. First of all, that of having access to a vast cultural space, of "reading the complete version of the texts of which [he] had only read extracts in Port-au-Prince". Then, that of enjoying the nightlife, of "the night without risks, without police threat, with young girls drinking wine in cafes, in the middle of singers, poets, singers. "</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>DaniÃ¨le Henkel</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Born in Morocco, DaniÃ¨le Henkel is a true figurehead of the entrepreneurial field in Quebec. In 1990, she moved to the province with her family. Committed and determined, she takes on many challenges in order to carve out a place for herself in the business world. Stopping at nothing, she imported the very first exfoliating glove in North America. It comes from an ancestral ritual practiced in the hammams of his native country. To this day, his family business Renaissance still keeps this Moroccan tradition alive in his host country of Quebec.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Dans le cadre de la JournÃ©e nationale du vivre-ensemble, qui aura lieu au QuÃ©bec le 15 janvier prochain, PROMIS souhaite souligner la prÃ©sence de 5 personnalitÃ©s publiques qui font de la vie culturelle quÃ©bÃ©coise un espace dans lequel la diversitÃ© ne cesse de fleurir.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Kim Thuy<br>LâÃ©crivaine est dâorigine vietnamienne. Câest Ã  lâÃ¢ge de 10 ans quâelle quitte son pays natal et arrive au QuÃ©bec. Ses Åuvres littÃ©raires sont grandement inspirÃ©es de sa vie personnelle. Certains de ses romans font rÃ©fÃ©rence au parcours migratoire des rÃ©fugiÃ©s vietnamiens ainsi quâÃ  lâexploration de la double identitÃ©. Kim Thuy est Ã©galement confÃ©renciÃ¨re. Ã de nombreuses occasions, elle mentionne sa belle relation avec sa terre dâaccueil. En 2020, Ã  lâÃ©mission Â« Le Temps du dÃ©bat Â» sur France Culture, elle partage son sentiment que le QuÃ©bec lui a permis de Â« solidifier [son] ancrage en [lui] offrant toute la libertÃ© nÃ©cessaire pour faire pousser [ses] branches au rythme du soleil et de la lune. Â»</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Boucar Diouf<br>Dâorigine sÃ©nÃ©galaise, Boucar Diouf a explorÃ© plusieurs carriÃ¨res. Entre autres, il est animateur de tÃ©lÃ©vision et de radio, biologiste, ocÃ©anographe, humoriste et Ã©crivain. Il sâinstalle au QuÃ©bec en 1991, dans la rÃ©gion de Rimouski. Ãtant dans une situation de handicap, il vivait une dÃ©tresse physique et psychologique qui sâest grandement dissipÃ©e depuis son arrivÃ©e au pays. Dans une entrevue accordÃ©e Ã  la revue ChÃ¢telaine en 2015, il dÃ©clare : Â« comme immigrant, si jâaime cette nation, câest parce quâon mây a proposÃ© un vivre-ensemble dans une vÃ©ritable laÃ¯citÃ©. Entre les dÃ©boires du communautarisme inspirÃ© du modÃ¨le britannique et ce QuÃ©bec mÃ©tissÃ© serrÃ© quâon tente de mettre en place, je suis absolument certain que câest ici quâon trouve le projet dâaccueil et dâintÃ©gration de la diversitÃ© le plus ouvert. Â»</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Jemmy Echaquan DubÃ©<br>Cette jeune comÃ©dienne est issue de la communautÃ© attikamek de Manawan. Elle est Ã©galement porte-parole du RÃ©seau jeunesse des PremiÃ¨res Nations et travaille pour lâorganisme Wapikoni.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Dany LaferriÃ¨re<br>En plus dâÃªtre Ã©crivain, lâhomme dâorigine haÃ¯tienne est aussi poÃ¨te, scÃ©nariste, rÃ©alisateur et journaliste. MalgrÃ© un dÃ©but de parcours difficile durant lequel il obtient des emplois prÃ©caires, toute son Åuvre littÃ©raire sÃ©duit les lecteurs quÃ©bÃ©cois depuis son roman de 1985. DÃ¨s son arrivÃ©e, Dany LaferriÃ¨re profite de sa libertÃ©. Tout dâabord, celle dâavoir accÃ¨s Ã  un vaste espace culturel, de Â« lire la version intÃ©grale des textes dont [il] nâavait lu que des extraits Ã  Port-au-Prince Â». Â»</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>DaniÃ¨le Henkel<br>NÃ©e au Maroc, DaniÃ¨le Henkel est une vÃ©ritable figure de proue du domaine entrepreneurial au QuÃ©bec. En 1990, elle sâinstalle dans la province avec sa famille. Ã ce jour, son entreprise familiale Renaissance fait toujours vivre cette tradition marocaine sur sa terre dâaccueil quâest le QuÃ©bec.</p>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Assess your needs to choose your insurance[:fr]Ãvaluer ses besoins pour bien choisir ses assurances[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/evaluer-ses-besoins-pour-bien-choisir-ses-assurances/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 18 Nov 2023 21:24:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=54</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When we arrive in a foreign country, our need for protection may increase. We may, with good reason, feel the need to protect ourselves, but also to protect our family and everything we own. In Quebec, there are several types of insurance that can help us overcome some of our insecurities. However, before choosing insurance, it is essential to define our needs and budget. Taking steps to choose your insurer and select the product that suits you can quickly become a real headache. That's why here we offer you an overview of the most common insurances.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a><u>Health and medicines</u></a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Depending on immigration status, it may take some time before a person is eligible for the Quebec Health Insurance Plan (RAMQ). That's why health insurance is so valuable. Many insurers offer the possibility for newcomers, temporary workers, international students as well as visitors to obtain coverage in case of need for hospital care, care prescribed by a doctor (for example, prescription drugs, x-rays, etc.), ambulance fees and any other necessary health-related expenses. Obviously, it is not appropriate to take out the most expensive insurance when we know that we will be entitled to RAMQ coverage shortly. On the other hand, if you think you have to wait a long time to get it, it is better to take out more comprehensive insurance. The cost of these insurances will depend on your age and sometimes your current state of health. The length of your stay can also influence the cost of insurance. In Quebec, prescription drug insurance is mandatory. It can be taken from the RAMQ unless you have a work permit or a study permit. In this case, it will be necessary to subscribe to a private insurance.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a><u>Dwelling</u></a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you've just purchased a property, it's almost certain you'll want home insurance. If you live in a rental accommodation, know that it is also possible to insure your home. Many insurers will offer you basic protection to which you can add additional production. Nevertheless, one must always be vigilant with regard to the conditions of complaint. Basic insurance can cover fire, water damage, theft, but the context and conditions in which the damage occurred influence the degree of protection. Always be informed of the conditions that govern your insurance contract.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a><u>Car</u></a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When you own a car, you also have the obligation to take out insurance. Again, you will have several options. With basic protection, you will normally be covered in the event of a collision. However, you can add protection in case of damage caused by bad weather, theft or fire. It is recommended to assess your needs by considering the risks around you. For example, whether you live in the countryside or in the city, the risks associated with weather conditions are not quite the same. Similarly, if you lend your car to a less experienced person, you run more risk.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a><u>Life and disability insurance</u></a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Life insurance can take many forms. Nevertheless, they offer protection to those around you in the event of death. It can be worrying to leave our family without financial resources to continue housing and to pay the various expenses generated by our death. Insurance will allow them to cover some of these costs. However, your needs may lead you to take out disability insurance only. This will allow you to obtain a salary if you are the victim of an accident or suffer from an illness that prevents you from continuing your work.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In short, the choice of insurance will always depend on your needs, but also on your financial situation. For help with the process, <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/accueil-et-integration/">click here</a> to make an appointment with one of our reception and integration advisors. In addition, be aware that many employers offer their employees private insurance among which you will find several protection options. If you are looking for a job, do not hesitate to make an appointment with one of our employment assistance counsellors by <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/aide-a-lemploi/">clicking here</a>.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Lorsque nous arrivons dans un pays Ã©tranger, notre besoin de protection peut sâaccentuer. Nous pouvons, avec raison, ressentir le besoin de nous protÃ©ger, mais Ã©galement de protÃ©ger notre famille ainsi que tout ce que nous possÃ©dons. Au QuÃ©bec, il existe plusieurs types dâassurance qui peuvent nous aider Ã  combler certaines de nos insÃ©curitÃ©s. Cependant, avant de choisir une assurance, il est primordial de dÃ©finir nos besoins et notre budget. Se lancer dans des dÃ©marches pour choisir son assureur et sÃ©lectionner le produit qui nous convient peut rapidement devenir un vrai casse-tÃªte. Câest pourquoi nous vous offrons ici un aperÃ§u des assurances les plus rÃ©pandues.<br><br>SantÃ© et mÃ©dicaments<br>Selon le statut dâimmigration, il peut se passer un certain temps avant quâune personne soit Ã©ligible au RÃ©gime dâassurance maladie du QuÃ©bec (RAMQ). Câest pourquoi une assurance santÃ© est si prÃ©cieuse. Plusieurs assureurs offrent la possibilitÃ© aux nouveaux arrivants, aux travailleurs temporaires, aux Ã©tudiants Ã©trangers ainsi quâaux visiteurs dâobtenir une garantie en cas de nÃ©cessitÃ© de soins hospitaliers, de soins prescrits par un mÃ©decin (par exemple, les mÃ©dicaments sous ordonnance, les radiographies, etc.), de frais dâambulance et de toutes autres dÃ©penses nÃ©cessaires liÃ©es Ã  la santÃ©. Ãvidemment, il nâest pas pertinent de prendre lâassurance la plus dispendieuse lorsque nous savons que nous aurons droit Ã  la protection de la RAMQ sous peu. En revanche, si vous croyez devoir attendre une longue pÃ©riode pour lâobtenir, mieux vaut prendre une assurance plus complÃ¨te. Le coÃ»t de ces assurances va dÃ©pendre de votre Ã¢ge et parfois de votre Ã©tat de santÃ© actuel. La durÃ©e de votre sÃ©jour peut Ã©galement influencer le coÃ»t de lâassurance. Au QuÃ©bec lâassurance-mÃ©dicaments est obligatoire. Elle peut Ãªtre prise auprÃ¨s de la RAMQ sauf si vous possÃ©dez un permis de travail ou un permis dâÃ©tudes. Dans ce cas, il faudra souscrire Ã  une assurance privÃ©e.<br><br>Habitation<br>Si vous venez dâacquÃ©rir une propriÃ©tÃ©, il est pratiquement certain que vous voudrez obtenir une assurance habitation. Si vous rÃ©sidez dans un logement en location, sachez quâil est Ã©galement possible dâassurer votre logis. Plusieurs assureurs vont vous offrir une protection de base Ã  laquelle vous pouvez ajouter une production complÃ©mentaire. NÃ©anmoins, il faut toujours Ãªtre vigilant en ce qui concerne les conditions de rÃ©clamation. Une assurance de base peut couvrir les incendies, les dÃ©gÃ¢ts dâeau, les vols, mais le contexte et les conditions dans lesquelles les dommages se sont produits influencent le degrÃ© de protection. Soyez toujours informÃ©s des conditions qui rÃ©gissent votre contrat dâassurance.<br><br>Voiture<br>Quand vous possÃ©dez une voiture, vous avez Ã©galement lâobligation de contracter une assurance. Encore une fois, plusieurs options sâoffriront Ã  vous. Avec une protection de base, vous serez normalement couvert en cas de collision. Toutefois, vous pourrez ajouter une protection en cas de dommages causÃ©s par des intempÃ©ries, un vol ou encore un incendie. Il est recommandÃ© dâÃ©valuer ses besoins en considÃ©rant les risques qui nous entourent. Par exemple, que vous viviez en campagne ou en ville, les risques liÃ©s aux conditions mÃ©tÃ©orologiques ne sont pas tout Ã  fait les mÃªmes. De mÃªme, si vous prÃªtez votre voiture Ã  une personne moins expÃ©rimentÃ©e, vous courez davantage de risques.<br><br>Assurance vie et invaliditÃ©<br>Les assurances vie peuvent prendre plusieurs formes. MalgrÃ© tout, elles offrent une protection Ã  votre entourage en cas de dÃ©cÃ¨s. Il peut Ãªtre inquiÃ©tant de laisser notre famille sans ressource financiÃ¨re pour continuer de se loger et pour payer les diffÃ©rents frais engendrÃ©s par notre dÃ©cÃ¨s. Lâassurance leur permettra dâassumer certains de ces coÃ»ts. Toutefois, vos besoins peuvent vous amener Ã  prendre uniquement une assurance dâinvaliditÃ©. Celle-ci vous permettra dâobtenir un salaire si vous Ãªtes victime dâun accident ou atteint dâune maladie qui vous empÃªche de poursuivre votre travail.<br>En somme, le choix dâune assurance dÃ©pendra toujours de vos besoins, mais Ã©galement de votre situation financiÃ¨re. Pour obtenir de lâaide dans vos dÃ©marches, cliquez ici pour prendre rendez-vous avec lâun de nos conseillers en accueil et intÃ©gration. De plus, sachez que plusieurs employeurs offrent Ã  leurs employÃ©s des assurances privÃ©es parmi lesquelles vous retrouverez plusieurs options de protection. Si vous Ãªtes Ã  la recherche dâun emploi, nâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  prendre un rendez-vous avec lâun de nos conseillers en aide Ã  lâemploi en cliquant ici.</p>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[nouvelle-recente]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[:en]Recents News[:fr]Nouvelles rÃ©centes[:]]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_nouvelle-recente]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[field_6578d2580b913]]></wp:meta_value>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]All about the Canadian citizenship test[:fr]Tout savoir sur lâexamen de citoyennetÃ© canadienne[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/tout-savoir-sur-lexamen-de-citoyennete-canadienne/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 18 Nov 2023 21:27:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=56</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The final stretch of the complete immigration process for anyone who wants to commit to it, the citizenship test allows them to obtain Canadian nationality. By becoming a citizen of Canada, you get the right to vote, a Canadian passport and even the opportunity to run in federal or provincial elections if you aspire to it!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A step no less symbolic than stressful for many candidates in the process of becoming a citizen of Canada, the citizenship test is the subject of recurring questions about its progress and its specificities. Our advisors give you an overview of the process.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Who can apply for citizenship and under what conditions?</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To become a Canadian citizen, you must apply to the government. You can obtain<a href="https://www.canada.ca/fr/immigration-refugies-citoyennete/services/demande/formulaires-demande-guides/demande-citoyennete-canadienne-adultes.html"> the application package</a> available on the official IRCC website. Count $630 CAD for an adult, $100 CAD for a minor or a person born to a Canadian parent.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Not everyone is eligible, you must meet certain criteria before formulating your wish:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>be a permanent resident;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>have lived in Canada for at least 3 years in the last 5 years, i.e. precisely 1095 days;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>have filed your tax returns if you were required to do so;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>demonstrate your language skills in one of the country's two official languages, English or French;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>not have been convicted of a crime, whether on Canadian territory or abroad, be serving a prison sentence or be on parole/probation;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>and finally, pass your citizenship test!</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Why a citizenship test?</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>All individuals between the ages of 18 and 54 at the time of applying for citizenship are required to take this test. It allows Canadian authorities to ensure that you have sufficient knowledge of your adopted country and the rights and privileges that citizenship confers on you.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>What's next!</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To help you prepare for all stages of the citizenship test, PROMIS offers <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/services/preparation-a-l-examen-de-la-citoyennete-du-canada/">two workshops</a> so that you are well equipped for this step.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The first covers the following topics:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Requirements for applying for citizenship</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The procedure</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Preparation</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The citizenship test</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Oath of Citizenship and Ceremony</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The second allows you to practice with a live exam and then review the questions as a group.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you have any further questions about applying and testing citizenship, please do not hesitate to <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/contact/">contact our advisors. </a>It is always our pleasure to offer you personalized support for your efforts!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p> </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>DerniÃ¨re ligne droite du parcours dâimmigration complet Ã  qui voudra sây engager, lâexamen de citoyennetÃ© permet de dÃ©crocher la nationalitÃ© canadienne. Nos conseillers vous donnent un aperÃ§u du processus.<br><br>Qui peut prÃ©senter une demande de citoyennetÃ© et sous quelles conditions?<br><br>Pour obtenir la citoyennetÃ© canadienne, vous devez en faire la demande auprÃ¨s du gouvernement. Vous pouvez vous procurer la trousse de demande disponible sur le site officiel de lâIRCC. Comptez 630 $ CAD pour un adulte, 100 $ CAD pour un mineur ou une personne nÃ©e dâun parent canadien.<br><br>Tout le monde nâest pas admissible, il vous faut respecter certains critÃ¨res avant de formuler votre souhait:<br>Ãªtre rÃ©sident permanent;<br>avoir habitÃ© au moins 3 ans au Canada au cours des 5 derniÃ¨res annÃ©es, soit prÃ©cisÃ©ment 1095 jours;<br>avoir produit vos dÃ©clarations de revenus si vous Ã©tiez tenu de le faire;<br>dÃ©montrer vos compÃ©tences linguistiques dans lâune des deux langues officielles du pays, soit le franÃ§ais ou lâanglais;<br>ne pas avoir Ã©tÃ© reconnu coupable dâun crime, que ce soit sur le territoire canadien ou Ã  lâÃ©tranger, purger une peine dâemprisonnement ou Ãªtre en libertÃ© conditionnelle / en probation;<br>et enfin, rÃ©ussir votre examen pour la citoyennetÃ©!<br><br>Pourquoi un examen de citoyennetÃ©?<br><br>Toutes les personnes Ã¢gÃ©es de 18 Ã  54 ans au moment de prÃ©senter leur demande de citoyennetÃ© ont Ã  passer cet examen. Il permet aux autoritÃ©s canadiennes de sâassurer que vous avez une connaissance suffisante de votre pays dâadoption, ainsi que des droits et privilÃ¨ges que vous confÃ¨re la citoyennetÃ©.<br><br>La suite!<br>Afin de vous aider Ã  vous prÃ©parer Ã  toutes les Ã©tapes de lâexamen de citoyennetÃ©, PROMIS offre deux ateliers afin que vous soyez bien outillÃ© pour cette Ã©tape.<br><br>Le premier couvre les sujets suivants:<br>Les exigences pour dÃ©poser une demande de citoyennetÃ©<br>La procÃ©dure<br>La prÃ©paration<br>Lâexamen de citoyennetÃ©<br>Le serment de citoyennetÃ© et la cÃ©rÃ©monie<br><br>Le second vous permet de vous pratiquer avec un examen en direct, puis de rÃ©viser les questions en groupe.<br>Si vous avez dâautres questions sur la demande et lâexamen de citoyennetÃ©, nâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  contacter nos conseillers. Il nous fait toujours plaisir de vous offrir un accompagnement personnalisÃ© pour vos dÃ©marches!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>
