							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]How to help your partner to immigrate to Quebec[:fr]Comment parrainer votre partenaire pour immigrer au QuÃ©bec[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/how-to-help-your-partner-to-immigrate-to-quebec/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 08 Dec 2023 18:05:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=410</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You recently got your permanent residence, congratulations! You like Quebec and want to settle there permanently. Now that you have taken this big step, you would like to sponsor your partner to live together this new adventure. How do you sponsor your partner's permanent residence? We explain everything!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>1. How does a sponsorship application work?</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To complete a sponsorship application, you must first complete the process at the federal level, with <a href="https://www.canada.ca/fr/immigration-refugies-citoyennete/services/immigrer-canada/parrainer-membre-famille.html">Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship (IRCC).</a> Once you have sent the Government of Canada all the required forms with the requested supporting documents and paid the processing fee, IRCC will analyze your entire file.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If it is deemed admissible, you will be invited to submit your application at the provincial level to the <a href="https://www.quebec.ca/immigration/parrainer-membre-famille">&nbsp;MinistÃ¨re de l'Immigration, de la DiversitÃ© et de l'Inclusion (MIDI).</a> Again, you will have to fill out the requested forms, attach the supporting documents and pay the required fees. After reviewing your file, the MIDI will forward its decision to the IRCC office, which will process the application for permanent residence you are sponsoring if your partner meets the requirements set out below.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>2. Eligibility criteria to sponsor...</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To sponsor your partner, you must meet the following conditions:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>be at least 18 years of age;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>be a Canadian citizen or permanent resident;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>live in Canada or prove that you plan to return with your partner;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>not have been convicted, on Canadian soil or abroad, of murder or certain serious offences;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>not receiving social assistance for a reason other than disability;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>be able and willing to make a financial commitment to your partner for at least three years;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>not be subject to a removal order or be detained in prison.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Finally, if you sponsored a previous partner and less than three years have passed since they became a permanent resident, if you have defaulted on past commitments or are in default, you cannot sponsor your current partner.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>What is commitment?</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>For three years from the date your partner becomes a permanent resident, you commit to providing for their basic needs. In particular, you must assume his expenses related to housing, food, clothing, travel but also all costs related to health or professional integration.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In a way, you vouch for the person you are sponsoring and must repay any money they may receive in the form of government financial assistance or special benefits. It is very difficult to terminate a sponsorship undertaking prematurely; It cannot be cancelled due to financial problems or if your relationship ends. This is a decision that should not be taken lightly!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>3. and the conditions to be sponsored</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The person you are sponsoring must be at least 18 years old and hold a valid passport. In most cases, individuals who have been convicted of criminal offences will not be eligible for the sponsorship program. Your partner will also have to undergo a medical examination.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The type of application you will need to file depends on the right title for your relationship. The Act distinguishes between the status of spouses, common-law partners or conjugal partners. Make sure you meet the requirements for these different categories to ensure you are eligible for the program:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Spouse: if your marriage is legally recognized by the laws of Canada and the country where it took place;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Common-law spouses: if you can prove that you have lived together for at least 12 consecutive months;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Conjugal partners; if you have been in a relationship for at least a year and are not living together for reasons beyond your control.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>4. Apply for sponsorship</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you meet the various requirements, and you and your partner are ready to embark on this process, you can start by obtaining the<a href="https://www.ircc.canada.ca/francais/information/demandes/conjoint.asp"> application package</a> available on the IRCC website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The processing time for applications is estimated at 12 months at this time. The application fee is updated annually; Since the end of April, it is necessary to count at least $ 1,080 at the federal level, $ 301 for the provincial.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If your application is refused, you have various avenues to appeal the decision. Do not hesitate to turn to Promis advisors to assist you in your efforts and obtain more information on your possibilities. You can <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/contact/">make an appointment</a> for a free meeting, online or in person.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Vous avez rÃ©cemment obtenu votre rÃ©sidence permanente, fÃ©licitations! Vous vous plaisez au QuÃ©bec et souhaitez-vous y installer durablement. Maintenant que vous avez franchi cette grande Ã©tape, vous aimeriez parrainer votre partenaire pour vivre ensemble cette nouvelle aventure. Comment sây prendre pour parrainer la rÃ©sidence permanente de votre partenaire? On vous explique tout!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1. Comment Ã§a fonctionne, une demande de parrainage?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Pour remplir une demande de parrainage, vous devez tout dâabord complÃ©ter le processus au niveau fÃ©dÃ©ral, auprÃ¨s dâImmigration, RÃ©fugiÃ©s et CitoyennetÃ© (IRCC). <!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sâil est jugÃ© recevable, vous serez invitÃ© Ã  formuler votre demande au niveau provincial auprÃ¨s du MinistÃ¨re de lâImmigration, de la DiversitÃ© et de lâInclusion (MIDI). <!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2. Les critÃ¨res dâadmissibilitÃ© pour parrainerâ¦</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Pour parrainer votre partenaire, vous devez respecter les conditions suivantes:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· avoir au moins 18 ans;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· Ãªtre un citoyen canadien ou un rÃ©sident permanent;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· vivre au Canada ou prouver que vous prÃ©voyez dây revenir avec votre partenaire;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· ne pas avoir Ã©tÃ© reconnu coupable, sur le sol canadien ou Ã  lâÃ©tranger, dâun meurtre ou de certaines infractions graves;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· ne pas recevoir dâaide sociale pour une raison autre quâune invaliditÃ©;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· Ãªtre en capacitÃ© et prÃªt Ã  prendre un engagement financier vis-Ã -vis de votre partenaire pendant au moins trois ans;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· ne pas faire lâobjet dâune mesure de renvoi ou Ãªtre dÃ©tenu en prison.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Enfin, si vous avez parrainÃ© un partenaire antÃ©rieur et que moins de trois ans se sont Ã©coulÃ©s depuis lâobtention de sa rÃ©sidence permanente, si vous avez manquÃ© Ã  vos engagements passÃ©s ou Ãªtes en dÃ©faut de paiement, vous ne pouvez pas parrainer votre partenaire actuel.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Lâengagement, de quoi sâagit-il?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Pendant trois ans Ã  compter de la date Ã  laquelle votre partenaire obtient le statut de rÃ©sident permanent, vous vous engagez Ã  subvenir financiÃ¨rement Ã  ses besoins essentiels. Vous devez notamment assumer ses dÃ©penses liÃ©es au logement, Ã  la nourriture, Ã  lâhabillement, Ã  ses dÃ©placements mais aussi tous les coÃ»ts relatifs Ã  la santÃ© ou Ã  son insertion professionnelle.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>En quelque sorte, vous vous portez garant de la personne que vous parrainez et devez rembourser toutes les sommes quâelle pourrait percevoir sous forme dâaide financiÃ¨re gouvernementale ou de prestations spÃ©ciales. Il est trÃ¨s difficile de mettre prÃ©maturÃ©ment fin Ã  un engagement pris dans le cadre du parrainage; il ne peut Ãªtre annulÃ© en raison de problÃ¨mes financiers ou si votre relation se termine. Câest une dÃ©cision quâil ne faut donc pas prendre Ã  la lÃ©gÃ¨re!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3. et les conditions pour Ãªtre parrainÃ©</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>La personne que vous parrainez doit Ãªtre Ã¢gÃ©e dâau moins 18 ans et dÃ©tenir un passeport valide. Dans la plupart des cas, les personnes ayant Ã©tÃ© condamnÃ©es pour des infractions criminelles ne seront pas admissibles au programme de parrainage. Votre partenaire devra aussi se soumettre Ã  un examen mÃ©dical.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Le type de demande que vous devrez dÃ©poser dÃ©pend du titre adaptÃ© Ã  votre relation. La Loi distingue en effet les statuts dâÃ©poux, de conjoints de fait ou de partenaires conjugaux. Assurez-vous de respecter les exigences relatives Ã  ces diffÃ©rentes catÃ©gories pour Ãªtre certain dâÃªtre admissibles au programme:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· Ãpoux: si votre mariage est lÃ©galement reconnu par les lois canadiennes et celles du pays oÃ¹ il a eu lieu;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· Conjoints de fait: si vous Ãªtes en mesure de prouver habiter ensemble depuis au moins 12 mois consÃ©cutifs;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Â· Partenaires conjugaux; si vous entretenez votre relation depuis au moins un an et que vous nâhabitez pas ensemble pour des raisons indÃ©pendantes de votre volontÃ©.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>4. DÃ©poser une demande de parrainage</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Si vous rÃ©pondez aux diffÃ©rentes exigences formulÃ©es, que votre partenaire et vous Ãªtes prÃªts Ã  vous lancer dans ce processus, vous pouvez commencer par vous procurer la trousse de demande disponible sur le site de lâIRCC.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>La durÃ©e de traitement des demandes est estimÃ©e Ã  12 mois pour le moment. Les frais de dossier sont mis Ã  jour annuellement; depuis la fin avril, il faut compter minimum 1 080$ au niveau fÃ©dÃ©ral, 301 $ pour le provincial.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Si votre demande est refusÃ©e, vous disposez de diffÃ©rents recours pour faire appel de la dÃ©cision. NâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  vous tourner vers les conseillers de Promis pour vous accompagner dans vos dÃ©marches et obtenir de plus amples renseignements sur vos possibilitÃ©s. Vous pouvez prendre rendez-vous pour une rencontre gratuite, en ligne ou en personne.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Study in Montreal How to: Reduce the Cost of Student Living[:fr]Ãtudier Ã  MontrÃ©al comment: rÃ©duire le coÃ»t de la vie Ã©tudiante[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/etudier-a-montreal-comment-reduire-le-cout-de-la-vie-etudiante-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 08 Dec 2023 18:11:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=412</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With the start of the school year fast approaching, some students will be very happy to know that living in Montreal is no more expensive than in many other major Canadian cities. As an international student, it can sometimes be difficult to move towards the least expensive products and services. To help you establish a budget according to your means, here are some ideas.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Finding affordable housing</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>First of all, several schools have a student residence. Generally, the accommodations are offered at an affordable price, they are furnished and utilities are included. Some residences offer studios for the modest sum of $415/month. For more information, visit your institution's website. Then, on the island of Montreal, housing prices differ depending on the neighbourhood. The boroughs of CÃ´te-des-Neiges, Hochelaga-Maisonneuve, Saint-Laurent, Ahuntsic and Villeray-Parc-Extension will be the least expensive, if you are looking for a small apartment. In order to reduce housing costs, colocation can also be a good solution. Notably, in Verdun, the price of large apartments is lower. To find the rare pearl at a low price and to be on the lookout for roommate offers, do not hesitate to consult classified ad websites, social networks and to inquire with your student association.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Furnish yourself without breaking the bank</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The price of furnished accommodation can sometimes be very affordable. If you are not so lucky, no worries. The offer of second-hand products is abundant. Classified ads and social networks are useful for finding appliances and furniture at low prices. In addition, resale stores, non-profit organizations, garage sales and bazaars are perfect places to find dishes, linen and decorative accessories.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Stay connected for a small fee</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To find a mobile plan and an internet plan adapted to your needs, it is advisable to turn to smaller companies. From $35/month you can find a mobile plan with the possibility of adding international calls at little cost. These same telecommunications companies can offer basic internet service for about $40/month.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Getting around without spending</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In Montreal, public transit is discounted for students. The monthly plan at $56/month will allow you unlimited bus and metro trips around the city. The use of public bicycles is also a good way to reduce transport costs. For a one-way trip, renting the bike will cost you $1 in base fare and then 15Â¢/minute.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Eating well all year round</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Food is sometimes less expensive in neighborhood grocery stores than in big box stores. In addition, student associations may offer food donations to their students on certain special days. Find out more about the services offered by your association. Several food assistance services are available throughout the city. Businesses such as restaurants, grocery stores and bakeries can donate their surplus food at the end of their day. Do not hesitate to consult these offers on the web.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Discover the city differently</a></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As you surely know, Montreal is a very festive city. During the summer, several free festivals are organized. You can also take advantage of reduced rates on your tickets to certain artistic and cultural institutions, upon presentation of your student card. Whether visiting museums, seeing a play or attending music concerts, find out about the rates available to students.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Finally, to facilitate your integration and learn more about the various possibilities available to you, we invite you to <a href="https://calendly.com/promis-immigration-fr/accueil-et-integration/?utm_medium=%28none%29&utm_source=%28direct%29&_ga=2.244761093.1684986847.1659385478-1227534484.1659385478&month=2022-08/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=live">make an appointment</a> with one of our reception and integration advisors. If you are an immigrant woman, <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/residence-maria-goretti/">consult here</a> the&nbsp; accommodation service offer of the Maria-Goretti Residence. In addition, we regularly organize workshops to teach you how to cook with Quebec products and discover new recipes! Consult our <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/calendrier/">calendar of activities</a> to learn more.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Avec la rentrÃ©e scolaire qui approche Ã  grands pas, certains Ã©tudiants seront trÃ¨s heureux de savoir que vivre Ã  MontrÃ©al nâest pas plus dispendieux que dans plusieurs autres grandes villes canadiennes. En tant quâÃ©tudiant Ã©tranger, il peut parfois Ãªtre difficile de sâorienter vers les produits et les services les moins coÃ»teux. Afin de vous aider Ã  Ã©tablir un budget selon vos moyens, voici quelques pistes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Trouver un logement abordable</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Tout dâabord, plusieurs Ã©tablissements scolaires possÃ¨dent une rÃ©sidence Ã©tudiante. GÃ©nÃ©ralement, les logements sont offerts Ã  un prix abordable, ils sont meublÃ©s et les charges sont incluses. Certaines rÃ©sidences offrent des studios pour la modique somme de 415$/mois. Pour plus de renseignements, visitez le site web de votre institution. Ensuite, sur lâÃ®le de MontrÃ©al, les prix des logements diffÃ¨rent selon les quartiers. Les arrondissements CÃ´te-des-Neiges, Hochelaga-Maisonneuve, Saint-Laurent, Ahuntsic et Villeray-Parc-Extension seront les moins coÃ»teux, si vous Ãªtes Ã  la recherche dâun petit appartement. Afin de rÃ©duire les coÃ»ts liÃ©s au logement, la colocation peut Ã©galement Ãªtre une bonne solution. Notamment, Ã  Verdun, le prix des grands appartements est moins Ã©levÃ©. Pour trouver la perle rare Ã  petit prix et</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>pour Ãªtre Ã  lâaffÃ»t des offres de colocation, nâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  consulter les sites web de petites annonces, les rÃ©seaux sociaux et Ã  vous informer auprÃ¨s de votre association Ã©tudiante.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Se meubler sans se ruiner</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Le prix des logements meublÃ©s peut parfois Ãªtre trÃ¨s abordable. Si vous nâavez pas cette chance, aucun souci. Lâoffre de produits dâoccasion est abondante. Les petites annonces et les rÃ©seaux sociaux sont utiles pour trouver des Ã©lectromÃ©nagers et des meubles Ã  bas prix. Par ailleurs, les magasins de revente, les organismes Ã  but non lucratif, les ventes de garage ainsi que les bazars sont des lieux parfaits pour trouver de la vaisselle, du linge de maison et des accessoires de dÃ©coration.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Rester connectÃ© Ã  petits frais</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Pour trouver un forfait mobile et un forfait internet adaptÃ© Ã  vos besoins, il est conseillÃ© de se tourner vers de plus petites entreprises. Ã partir de 35$/mois vous pourrez trouver un forfait mobile avec la possibilitÃ© dâajouter des appels internationaux Ã  peu de frais. Ces mÃªmes compagnies de tÃ©lÃ©communication peuvent offrir un service internet de base pour environ 40$/mois.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Se dÃ©placer sans dÃ©penser</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ã MontrÃ©al, le transport en commun est au tarif rÃ©duit pour les Ã©tudiants. Le forfait mensuel Ã  56$/mois vous permettra des dÃ©placements illimitÃ©s en autobus et en mÃ©tro Ã  travers la ville. Lâutilisation des vÃ©los publics est aussi une bonne faÃ§on de rÃ©duire les coÃ»ts de transport. Pour un aller simple, la location du vÃ©lo vous coÃ»tera 1$ en tarif de base puis 15Â¢/minute.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Bien manger toute lâannÃ©e</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>La nourriture est parfois moins dispendieuse dans les Ã©piceries de quartier que dans les grandes surfaces. De plus, les associations Ã©tudiantes peuvent offrir des dons de nourriture Ã  leurs Ã©tudiants lors de certaines journÃ©es particuliÃ¨res. Informez-vous auprÃ¨s des services offerts par votre association. Plusieurs services dâaide alimentaire sont disponibles Ã  travers la ville. Des commerces tels que des restaurants, des</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ã©piceries et des boulangeries peuvent faire don de leur nourriture excÃ©dentaire Ã  la fin de leur journÃ©e. NâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  consulter ces offres sur le web.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>DÃ©couvrir la ville autrement</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Comme vous le savez sÃ»rement, MontrÃ©al est une ville trÃ¨s festive. Durant la pÃ©riode estivale, plusieurs festivals gratuits sont organisÃ©s. Vous pouvez aussi profiter de tarifs rÃ©duits sur vos entrÃ©es dans certains Ã©tablissements artistiques et culturels, sur prÃ©sentation de votre carte Ã©tudiante. Que ce soit pour visiter les musÃ©es, voir une piÃ¨ce de thÃ©Ã¢tre ou pour assister Ã  des concerts de musique, informez-vous sur les tarifs disponibles pour les Ã©tudiants.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Enfin, pour faciliter votre intÃ©gration et en apprendre davantage sur les diverses possibilitÃ©s qui vous sont offertes, nous vous invitons Ã  prendre un rendez-vous avec lâun de nos conseillers en accueil et intÃ©gration. Si vous Ãªtes une femme immigrante, consultez ici lâoffre de service dâhÃ©bergement de la RÃ©sidence Maria-Goretti. De plus, nous organisons rÃ©guliÃ¨rement des ateliers pour vous apprendre Ã  cuisiner avec les produits du QuÃ©bec et dÃ©couvrir de nouvelles recettes! Consultez le calendrier de nos activitÃ©s pour en savoir plus.</p>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:fr]Sample Page[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/?page_id=2</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 Oct 2023 04:35:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?page_id=2</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><p>Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pi&#241;a coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)</p></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>...or something like this:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><p>The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.</p></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As a new WordPress user, you should go to <a href="https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/wp-admin/">your dashboard</a> to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:]]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Privacy Policy]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/?page_id=3</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 Oct 2023 04:35:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?page_id=3</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading --><h2>Who we are</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>Our website address is: https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>Comments</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor&#8217;s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p>An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>Media</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>Cookies</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p>If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p>When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select &quot;Remember Me&quot;, your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p>If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>Embedded content from other websites</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p>These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>Who we share your data with</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>How long we retain your data</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p>For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>What rights you have over your data</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph --><!-- wp:heading --><h2>Where your data is sent</h2><!-- /wp:heading --><!-- wp:paragraph --><p><strong class="privacy-policy-tutorial">Suggested text: </strong>Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.</p><!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Study in Montreal How to: Reduce the Cost of Student Living[:fr]Ãtudier Ã  MontrÃ©al : comment rÃ©duire le coÃ»t de la vie Ã©tudiante[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=55</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 18 Nov 2023 21:27:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=55</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With the start of the school year fast approaching, some students will be very happy to know that living in Montreal is no more expensive than in many other major Canadian cities. As an international student, it can sometimes be difficult to move towards the least expensive products and services. To help you establish a budget according to your means, here are some ideas.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Finding affordable housing</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>First of all, several schools have a student residence. Generally, the accommodations are offered at an affordable price, they are furnished and utilities are included. Some residences offer studios for the modest sum of $415/month. For more information, visit your institution's website. Then, on the island of Montreal, housing prices differ depending on the neighbourhood. The boroughs of CÃ´te-des-Neiges, Hochelaga-Maisonneuve, Saint-Laurent, Ahuntsic and Villeray-Parc-Extension will be the least expensive, if you are looking for a small apartment. In order to reduce housing costs, colocation can also be a good solution. Notably, in Verdun, the price of large apartments is lower. To find the rare pearl at a low price and to be on the lookout for roommate offers, do not hesitate to consult classified ad websites, social networks and to inquire with your student association.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Furnish yourself without breaking the bank</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The price of furnished accommodation can sometimes be very affordable. If you are not so lucky, no worries. The offer of second-hand products is abundant. Classified ads and social networks are useful for finding appliances and furniture at low prices. In addition, resale stores, non-profit organizations, garage sales and bazaars are perfect places to find dishes, linen and decorative accessories.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Stay connected for a small fee</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To find a mobile plan and an internet plan adapted to your needs, it is advisable to turn to smaller companies. From $35/month you can find a mobile plan with the possibility of adding international calls at little cost. These same telecommunications companies can offer basic internet service for about $40/month.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Getting around without spending</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In Montreal, public transit is discounted for students. The monthly plan at $56/month will allow you unlimited bus and metro trips around the city. The use of public bicycles is also a good way to reduce transport costs. For a one-way trip, renting the bike will cost you $1 in base fare and then 15Â¢/minute.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Eating well all year round</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Food is sometimes less expensive in neighborhood grocery stores than in big box stores. In addition, student associations may offer food donations to their students on certain special days. Find out more about the services offered by your association. Several food assistance services are available throughout the city. Businesses such as restaurants, grocery stores and bakeries can donate their surplus food at the end of their day. Do not hesitate to consult these offers on the web.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4,"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><a>Discover the city differently</a></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As you surely know, Montreal is a very festive city. During the summer, several free festivals are organized. You can also take advantage of reduced rates on your tickets to certain artistic and cultural institutions, upon presentation of your student card. Whether visiting museums, seeing a play or attending music concerts, find out about the rates available to students.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Finally, to facilitate your integration and learn more about the various possibilities available to you, we invite you to <a href="https://calendly.com/promis-immigration-fr/accueil-et-integration/?utm_medium=%28none%29&amp;utm_source=%28direct%29&amp;_ga=2.244761093.1684986847.1659385478-1227534484.1659385478&amp;month=2022-08/?utm_medium=organic&amp;utm_source=live">make an appointment</a> with one of our reception and integration advisors. If you are an immigrant woman, <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/residence-maria-goretti/">consult here</a> the&nbsp; accommodation service offer of the Maria-Goretti Residence. In addition, we regularly organize workshops to teach you how to cook with Quebec products and discover new recipes! Consult our <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/calendrier/">calendar of activities</a> to learn more.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_choix5]]></wp:meta_key>

		<title><![CDATA[[:en]Our team[:fr]Notre Ã©quipe[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/equipe/</link>

		</wp:postmeta>
							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[[:en]A practical guide to Quebecâs labour laws[:fr]Guide pratique pour comprendre les normes du travail au QuÃ©bec[:]]]></title>
		<link>https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/index.php/nouvelle/guide-pratique-pour-comprendre-les-normes-du-travail-au-quebec/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 11 Dec 2023 01:57:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admin_swh70ouy]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://les-belettes.tim-momo.com/wordpress/en/?post_type=nouvelle&#038;p=508</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[:en]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In Quebec, work is governed by the <em>Quebec Labour Code</em>. This document lays out rules for employers regarding the basic working conditions they must provide for their employees. Simply put, it specifies the core guidelines to be followed regarding salary, work hours, vacation time, absences, and termination.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The working world looks different in every country â thereâs so much to learn depending on where you are! Itâs therefore very important for you to know your rights so you can reach your full potential at your new job.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400">Salary</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You have a right to earn minimum wage no matter your role or employer, even if youâre only working a few hours per week, earning commission, or undergoing training.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Each year, the Quebec government determines the current rate for minimum wage.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In Quebec, your salary is paid out at a regular interval that cannot exceed 16 days. Each employee must receive a pay slip that details all of the information required to calculate their compensation.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Tips</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If your role earns tips, be aware that any tips you receive belong to you in their entirety, whether or not they are paid to you directly. Your employer is legally obligated to pay you the entire tip amount, without deducting any administrative fees that may be incurred. They are also required to pay you minimum wage!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Some workplaces have tip-sharing policies in place. Make sure to get informed about the tipping structure upon your arrival at the company.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400">Work hours</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The typical workweek in Quebec is 40 hours long, but many employers also operate between 35 and 39 hours per week. The number of hours you are required to fulfil every week must be explicitly stated in your employment contract.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Your work hours include breaks (even coffee breaks!) and any time you spend waiting for a task to be assigned to you. The only time you are âoff the clockâ is lunchtime, except when you work through your lunch break.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You may occasionally be asked to work more hours than you do in a typical week. In these cases, your employer will have to pay you for any overtime, provided that the additional time was approved in advance. Overtime is subject to a 50% markup (time and a half) based on your regular wage, not including bonuses.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If requested, your employer can also put your overtime hours towards an equivalent amount of vacation days instead of paying you for your time directly.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Did you know you are allowed to refuse overtime hours if you need to care for your child or a loved one? <a href="https://www.cnesst.gouv.qc.ca/fr/organisation/documentation/formulaires-publications/normes-travail-au-quebec">The CNESST website</a> covers the legal stipulations in detail.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400">Statutory holidays in Quebec</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The province has 8 statutory holidays that apply to the vast majority of salaried employees:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>January 1 (new yearâs day)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Good Friday or Easter Monday â employerâs choice</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The Monday before May 25 (National Patriotsâ Day)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>June 24 â or, if this date falls on a Sunday, June 25 (St. Jean Baptiste Day in Quebec)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>July 1 â or, of this date falls on a Sunday, July 2 (Canada Day)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The first Monday in September (Labour Day)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The second Monday in October (Thanksgiving)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>December 25 (Christmas Day)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These holidays are paid days off, except for employees who were absent without authorization on the day before or after the holiday.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you are required to work on a statutory holiday, you have the right, in addition to your regular compensation, to a replacement day off in the three weeks before or after the holiday.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400">Vacation</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The number of vacation days you are entitled to is calculated based on your reference year, which starts May 1 and ends April 30 the following year. The total length of your vacation will depend on your seniority.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you have been in your current role for less than a year, you will earn 1 vacation day per month of service, up to a maximum of 2 weeks. Starting after your first full year and up until your third year, you have the right to 2 weeks of vacation. At 3 years or more, you are entitled to 3 weeks.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Certain companies take a different approach and will offer you more vacation time as early as your first year. The companyâs policy should be clearly stated in your employment contract.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Sick days or time off</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition to vacation days, you are entitled to 2 paid absent days per year. You might choose to use them if youâre sick or have a family obligation.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400">Termination</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If an employer decides to terminate a contract that ties them to a salaried employee, they are obligated to provide written notice. The amount of prior notice required will depend on how long the individual was employed.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The first three months of a job are considered to be a trial period, so the employer is not required to give notice. The law requires 1 week of notice after 1 year of continuous employment, 2 weeks for between 1 and 5 years, 4 weeks for between 5 and 10 years, and 8 weeks after 10 years.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>No matter the situation, the employer must pay the dismissed employee an indemnity for any remaining vacation days that have not been spent, as well as an indemnity of 4-6% of the employeeâs gross salary earned during the reference year.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you lose your job, you may be eligible for <a href="https://educaloi.qc.ca/capsules/lassurance-emploi/">employment insurance</a> provided by the federal government.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400">French language laws at work</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As Quebecâs official language, French is commonplace at most Quebec companies. For those that also use English, which is often the case when conducting international business, article 4 in the <em>Charter of the French Language</em> stipulates that workers have the right to conduct their professional lives in French.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We strongly encourage you to keep working on your French not only because it will improve your personal life, but also because itâs important at work! Check the <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/en/calendar/">PROMIS event calendar</a> often to attend one of our information sessions and take a <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/en/categories-services/frenchcourses/">free French course</a> tailored to your proficiency level.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"400"}}} -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" style="font-style:normal;font-weight:400"><strong>Filing a claim with the CNESST</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you experience wrongful termination, poor working conditions, or if you have either experienced or witnessed harassment at work, you can contact the <a href="https://www.cnesst.gouv.qc.ca/en/client-services/complaints-recourses">CNESSTâs complaints and recourses</a> department.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The <em>Commission des normes, de lâÃ©quitÃ©, de la santÃ© et de la sÃ©curitÃ© du travail</em> (CNESST) will be able to advise you on the steps required to begin an investigation and compensate you if applicable.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you have any questions about your rights, our team is here to help! <a href="https://calendly.com/promis-immigration-fr/accueil-et-integration/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=google&_ga=2.171799904.1954841889.1649683801-982881889.1649683801&month=2022-04/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=statics.teams.cdn.office.net">Book an appointment with an advisor</a> at no cost to you, either in-person or virtually.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->[:fr]<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Au QuÃ©bec, le travail est encadrÃ© par la <em>Loi sur les normes du travail.</em> Elle impose aux employeurs les conditions minimales de travail quâils se doivent de respecter envers leurs salariÃ©s. La loi prÃ©cise donc les rÃ¨gles minimales Ã  appliquer en matiÃ¨re de salaire, de durÃ©e de travail, des vacances et absences ou encore la cessation dâemploi.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Le monde du travail est diffÃ©rent dans chaque pays, câest tout un univers Ã  dÃ©couvrir! Il est trÃ¨s important que vous soyez informÃ© de vos droits pour vous Ã©panouir pleinement dans votre nouvel emploi.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Le salaire</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Vous avez le droit au salaire minimum dÃ¨s lors que vous travaillez pour un employeur, mÃªme sâil ne sâagit que de quelques heures, que vous receviez des commissions ou si vous Ãªtes en formation.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Câest le gouvernement du QuÃ©bec qui fixe chaque annÃ©e le montant du salaire minimum.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Au QuÃ©bec, le salaire est versÃ© Ã  intervalles rÃ©guliers ne dÃ©passant pas seize jours. Chaque employÃ© doit recevoir un bulletin de paie dÃ©taillant toutes les informations nÃ©cessaires au calcul de sa rÃ©munÃ©ration.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Les pourboires</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Si votre travail implique des pourboires, sachez que les pourboires que vous recevez vous appartiennent en totalitÃ©, quâils vous aient Ã©tÃ© directement versÃ©s ou non. Votre employeur est donc dans lâobligation lÃ©gale de vous verser les pourboires qui vous ont Ã©tÃ© donnÃ©s, sans dÃ©duire les frais administratifs qui ont pu en dÃ©couler. Ãa ne lâempÃªche pas de devoir vous verser le salaire minimum!</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Il se peut cependant que votre organisation comporte une convention de partage des pourboires. Vous devez alors en Ãªtre informÃ© dÃ¨s votre arrivÃ©e dans lâentreprise.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Les horaires de travail</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>La semaine normale de travail dans la province est habituellement de 40 heures. De nombreuses entreprises proposent toutefois des semaines qui varient entre 35 et 39 heures. Le nombre dâheures de travail hebdomadaire doit explicitement Ãªtre stipulÃ© dans le contrat de travail Ã©tabli.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Vos horaires de travail comprennent aussi bien vos pauses (mÃªme les pauses cafÃ©!) que les temps oÃ¹ vous Ãªtes obligÃ©s dâattendre quâon vous assigne une tÃ¢che tant que vous vous montrez disponible. Seul le temps accordÃ© pour les repas nâest pas comptÃ©, sauf si vous demeurez Ã  votre poste pour travailler.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Il se peut que vous soyez amenÃ© Ã  travailler plus dâheures que votre horaire habituel. Votre employeur doit alors vous rÃ©munÃ©rer ces heures supplÃ©mentaires, sous couvert que ce temps de travail additionnel ait Ã©tÃ© approuvÃ© en amont. Elles sont assujetties Ã  une majoration de 50 % (taux et demi) de votre salaire horaire habituel, sans compter les primes.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ã votre demande, votre employeur peut Ã©galement remplacer le paiement des heures supplÃ©mentaires par une banque dâheures de congÃ© Ã©quivalente.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sachez que vous pouvez refuser de faire des heures supplÃ©mentaires si votre prÃ©sence est requise auprÃ¨s de votre enfant ou dâun proche aidant. <a href="https://www.cnesst.gouv.qc.ca/fr/organisation/documentation/formulaires-publications/normes-travail-au-quebec">Le site du CNESST </a>dÃ©taille toutes les spÃ©cificitÃ©s de la loi sur le sujet.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Les jours fÃ©riÃ©s au QuÃ©bec</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>La province compte 8 jours fÃ©riÃ©s auxquels la grande majoritÃ© des personnes salariÃ©es a droit :</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>&nbsp;Le 1er janvier (jour de lâAn)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Le Vendredi saint ou le lundi de PÃ¢ques, au choix de lâemployeur</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Le lundi qui prÃ©cÃ¨de le 25 mai (JournÃ©e nationale des patriotes)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Le 24 juin â ou, si cette date tombe un dimanche, le 25 juin (fÃªte nationale du QuÃ©bec)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Le 1er juillet â ou, si cette date tombe un dimanche, le 2 juillet (fÃªte du Canada)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>&nbsp;Le 1er lundi de septembre (fÃªte du Travail)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Le deuxiÃ¨me lundi dâoctobre (Action de grÃ¢ce)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Le 25 dÃ©cembre (jour de NoÃ«l)</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ces jours fÃ©riÃ©s sont donc chÃ´mÃ©s et payÃ©s, exception faite pour les personnes qui sâabsentent sans autorisation ou raison valable le jour prÃ©cÃ©dant ou suivant le jour fÃ©riÃ©.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Si lâactivitÃ© de votre entreprise vous contraint Ã  travailler un jour fÃ©riÃ©, vous avez droit, en plus de votre rÃ©munÃ©ration habituelle, Ã  une indemnitÃ© ou un congÃ© compensatoire dans les trois semaines qui prÃ©cÃ¨dent ou suivent le jour fÃ©riÃ©.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Les vacances</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Le nombre de jours auquel vous avez droit est calculÃ© selon votre annÃ©e de rÃ©fÃ©rence, pÃ©riode qui sâÃ©tend du 1er mai au 30 avril. La durÃ©e des vacances dÃ©pend de votre anciennetÃ©.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Si vous Ãªtes dans votre entreprise depuis moins dâun an, vous gagnez 1 jour de vacances par mois complet de service continu, jusquâÃ  un maximum de deux semaines de vacances. Depuis plus dâun an et moins de trois ans, vous avez droit Ã  2 semaines de congÃ©s. Au-delÃ  de trois ans dâanciennetÃ©, vous bÃ©nÃ©ficiez de trois semaines continues.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Certaines compagnies prennent dâautres dispositions et vous offrent plusieurs semaines de vacances dÃ¨s la premiÃ¨re annÃ©e. La politique de lâentreprise doit de toute faÃ§on Ãªtre clairement explicitÃ©e dans le contrat de travail.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Les congÃ©s maladies ou journÃ©es dâabsence</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Outre les vacances, vous avez droit Ã  deux jours dâabsence rÃ©munÃ©rÃ©s par an. Vous pouvez par exemple les utiliser en cas de maladie ou pour remplir des obligations familiales.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>La cessation dâemploi</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Si un employeur dÃ©cide de mettre fin au contrat qui le lie avec une personne salariÃ©e, il a obligation de lui donner un avis Ã©crit de cessation dâemploi. Les dÃ©lais de prÃ©avis dÃ©pendent de la durÃ©e dâoccupation du poste concernÃ©.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Durant la pÃ©riode dâessai des trois premiers mois dâactivitÃ©, lâemployeur nâest pas tenu de respecter un prÃ©avis. Au-delÃ , la loi prÃ©voit 1 semaine de prÃ©avis jusquâÃ  un an de service continu, 2 semaines de 1 Ã  moins de 5 ans dâexercice, 4 semaines de 5 Ã  10 ans et 8 semaines de prÃ©avis aprÃ¨s de dix ans.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Quoiquâil en soit, lâemployeur doit verser Ã  la personne salariÃ©e quâil congÃ©die une indemnitÃ© pour les vacances qui lui restaient Ã  utiliser ainsi quâune indemnitÃ© financiÃ¨re Ã©quivalant Ã  4 Ã  6% du salaire brut gagnÃ© au cours de lâannÃ©e de rÃ©fÃ©rence.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sachez que si vous perdez votre emploi, il est possible que vous soyez Ã©ligible aux <a href="https://educaloi.qc.ca/capsules/lassurance-emploi/">prestations de lâassurance-emploi</a> versÃ©es par le Gouvernement du Canada.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Lâusage de la langue franÃ§aise&nbsp;</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Langue officielle du QuÃ©bec, le franÃ§ais lâest aussi dans la plupart des entreprises quÃ©bÃ©coises. Si certaines adoptent Ã©galement lâanglais, notamment pour les Ã©changes Ã  lâinternational, lâarticle 4 de la <em>Charte de la langue franÃ§aise</em> reconnaÃ®t aux travailleurs le droit dâexercer leur activitÃ© professionnelle en franÃ§ais.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>On ne peut donc que vous encourager Ã  renforcer votre apprentissage du franÃ§ais pour vous intÃ©grer non seulement dans la vie quotidienne, mais aussi dans le cadre professionnel! NâhÃ©sitez pas Ã  consulter rÃ©guliÃ¨rement <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/calendrier/">le calendrier de PROMIS </a>pour participer Ã  nos sÃ©ances dâinformations et <a href="https://promis.qc.ca/fr/categories-services/francisation/">prendre des cours gratuits</a> selon votre niveau de maÃ®trise de la langue franÃ§aise.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 class="wp-block-heading"><strong>Les recours auprÃ¨s du CNESST</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>En cas de licenciement abusif, de mauvaises conditions de travail, si vous Ãªtes tÃ©moin ou pensez vivre une situation de harcÃ¨lement, vous pouvez vous rapprocher du <a href="https://www.cnesst.gouv.qc.ca/fr/service-clientele/plaintes-recours">service de plaintes et recours du CNESST</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>La commission des normes, de lâÃ©quitÃ©, de la santÃ© et de la sÃ©curitÃ© du travail (CNESST) sera en mesure de vous conseiller sur les dÃ©marches Ã  entreprendre, de mener une enquÃªte et de vous indemniser sâil y a lieu.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Si vous avez la moindre question sur vos droits, notre Ã©quipe est lÃ  pour Ã§a! <a href="https://calendly.com/promis-immigration-fr/accueil-et-integration/?utm_medium=organic&utm_source=google&_ga=2.171799904.1954841889.1649683801-982881889.1649683801&month=2022-04/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=statics.teams.cdn.office.net">Prenez rendez-vous avec un conseiller </a>dÃ¨s maintenant, les rencontres sont gratuites et se font en personne ou en ligne selon votre prÃ©fÃ©rence.</p>
